CustomField.formula: IF(OR(AND(SBQQ__UpgradedSubscription__r.Renewed_line__c != false, SBQQ__Quote__r.Associated_Opportunity_Type__c == 'Remorse Refund'), AND(SBQQ__Quote__r.Associated_Opportunity_Type__c == 'Revenue Opportunity', SBQQ__RenewedSubscription__c != null)),true, false)
CustomField.label: Renewed Line
